thread.title: Tale as Old as Time Afternoon Tea
thread.title_full: Tale as Old as Time Afternoon Tea - Review of The Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Gail G
title: Tale as Old as Time Afternoon Tea
text:
What a magical afternoon! The food was delicious and the menu quite original. From the savory entrees to the delightful sandwiches and brioche baguettes to the wonderful sweets - especially the clock! - it was all even better than it looked!The service, compliments of Sandoz, was gracious and accommodating. So glad I booked when I did, it sold out shortly after and we were told there's 2 1/2 thousand (!!) people on the waiting list!
My only complaint is that there was no discount offered for children as I would have loved to have brought my young granddaughters!
Hopefully this will be a regular spring event, as we would go again!
